teams.name: Stray Dogs in Sweaters
teams.description: The oldest team in Delhi Ultimate comprising of the most experienced players in the circuit. Many SDIS players are currently involved in developing the sport and acting as mentors to the newer teams in the city.

teams.name: Underdogs
teams.description: A beginner team comprising of entry-level players who want to play the sport competitively.

teams.name: Gurgaon Ultimate
teams.description: Comprises of mainly American Express employees along with some ther players from Gurgaon. It is still in its development phase and a few senior players have been working very hard to mobilize Ultimate in Gurgaon.
